name: part_007
file: tmp_【#マリン船長の番組】2周年記念に地獄企画いくつかやりました【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [tV0vI7Aflho]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Sakura Miko performs the side-to-side jumps (Hanpuku Yokotobi) fitness test while Houshou Marine counts.
Marine teases Miko for her low count and physical exhaustion. They discuss the results of the first event.
Momosuzu Nene praises Miko's form despite her lower count compared to Marine.
Himemori Luna performs her side-to-side jumps, achieving a high score of 38.
Luna collapses from exhaustion after her jump. Nene dramatically mourns her, but Luna quickly recovers.
The group transitions to the second event: the Balance Stand (Baransu Dachi). Nene explains the rules.
First attempt at the Balance Stand ends in chaos as Marine repeatedly interferes with the others.
The group restarts the Balance Stand. Marine continues to taunt them until she wins.
The group introduces the third event: the Upper Body Back Extension (Joutai Sorashi). Marine prepares to start.

subtitles.original: 15, 16... なんか遅くない？
subtitles.english: 15, 16... isn't it slow?

subtitles.original: 足が悲鳴をあげている...!!
subtitles.english: My legs are screaming...!!

subtitles.original: あら〜みこち!? あれ？遅くなってた？
subtitles.english: Wait, Mikochi!? Huh? Did I get slower?

subtitles.original: よくもイキってくれたな!! バシッ!
subtitles.english: How dare you act so tough!! *Whack!*

subtitles.original: 痛い!! もう! よくもイキってくれたな!
subtitles.english: Ouch!! Jeez! How dare you act so tough!

subtitles.original: マイナス分も合わせまして、結果23回かな？
subtitles.english: Including the deductions, the result is 23 times?

subtitles.original: 何回だった?? (船長は) 24回
subtitles.english: How many was it?? (Captain got) 24 times.

subtitles.original: えっ!? ああ〜っはっはっ!! マリン船長に負けてる!!
subtitles.english: What!? Aah-hah-hah!! You lost to Captain Marine!!

subtitles.original: フォームはみこ先輩の方が50倍くらい綺麗だった
subtitles.english: Miko-senpai's form was like 50 times more beautiful.

subtitles.original: 何だって!!
subtitles.english: What did you say!!

subtitles.original: じゃあ最後ルーナ先輩。現状1位は24回の船長なんで超えてって下さい
subtitles.english: Then finally, Luna-senpai. Currently 1st is Captain with 24, so please beat that.

subtitles.original: どんどんパルコアライン超えていくなんなの〜
subtitles.english: I'm going to keep crossing the parkour lines nano~

subtitles.original: ルーナ先輩の反復横跳びまで、3, 2, 1, GO!
subtitles.english: Until Luna-senpai's side-to-side jumps... 3, 2, 1, GO!
1, 2, 3... Oh, she's fast.

subtitles.original: うわああ! ルーナたん!!? ルーナたん!!
subtitles.english: Uwaaa! Luna-tan!!? Luna-tan!!

subtitles.original: ルーナたんがぁぁ!! シンジャッタヨォ!!
subtitles.english: Luna-tangaaaa!! She died!!

subtitles.original: 本気出しちゃった...
subtitles.english: I gave it my all...

subtitles.original: まだ1回目なんだけどな競技。甘いなルーナたん
subtitles.english: It's only the first event though. You're naive, Luna-tan.

subtitles.original: でも結果はルーナ先輩なんと38回!
subtitles.english: But the result for Luna-senpai is a whopping 38 times!

subtitles.original: いえぇ〜い!!
subtitles.english: Yee-haw!!

subtitles.original: すごいよ! 息がすごいよぉ!
subtitles.english: Amazing! Your breathing is intense!

subtitles.original: さあ何とね、今日は競技がいっぱいありますので、さっそく次の競技に!!
subtitles.english: Well, since there are many events today, let's move on to the next one!!

subtitles.original: じゃあ次の競技このままいきたいと思いますが
subtitles.english: Then I'd like to move on to the next event...

subtitles.original: 次はね、簡単だよみんな!
subtitles.english: Next is easy, everyone!

subtitles.original: 次はね、バランス立ちって言って、目を閉じてどれくらい片足でバランスを保っていられるか
subtitles.english: Next is the balance stand, where you close your eyes and see how long you can balance on one leg.

subtitles.original: なるほどね。いけるわこれはな
subtitles.english: I see. I can do this.

subtitles.original: ルール：目を閉じ片足立ちをし、どれくらい長く保っていられるかを競う
subtitles.english: Rule: Compete for how long you can hold a one-legged stand with your eyes closed.

subtitles.original: こっち、ルーナたんこっち。え、なんで？うん、こっち
subtitles.english: This way, Luna-tan this way. Eh, why? Yeah, over here.

subtitles.original: 絵面的にこうかなって
subtitles.english: I thought this would look better on screen.

subtitles.original: いくよ〜!! せーのって言ったらみんな同時に足を上げてください。3, 2, 1, GO!
subtitles.english: Here we go~!! Everyone raise your leg together. 3, 2, 1, GO!

subtitles.original: いやあぁぁぁぁぁぁ!!
subtitles.english: Iyaaaaaaa!!

subtitles.original: 違う勝負してない？大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Aren't you doing a different competition? Are you okay?

subtitles.original: 今この人が!! ルーナの妨害をしてきました!!
subtitles.english: Just now, this person!! Interfered with Luna!!

subtitles.original: 船長がみこのこと妨害してきました!!
subtitles.english: Captain interfered with Miko!!

subtitles.original: 私この人に妨害されました!!
subtitles.english: I was interfered with by this person!!

subtitles.original: 手ないもぉ〜ん!!
subtitles.english: I don't have hands!!

subtitles.original: じゃあ行きましょうみんな。3, 2, 1, GO!
subtitles.english: Then let's go everyone. 3, 2, 1, GO!

subtitles.original: もうダメだよ押しちゃ
subtitles.english: No more pushing, okay.

subtitles.original: コアマッスルを意識して
subtitles.english: Focus on your core muscles.

subtitles.original: ばか!! 体幹のチェックを... ガタガタガタ!!
subtitles.english: Stupid!! Checking the core... *rattle rattle!!*

subtitles.original: おれおれ、いい感じだ
subtitles.english: Oh, this feels good.

subtitles.original: ルーナ先輩も、ガタガタガタ!!
subtitles.english: Luna-senpai too, *rattle rattle!!*

subtitles.original: うわあああ!! 情けないね!!
subtitles.english: Uwaaaaaa!! How pathetic!!

subtitles.original: ちょっと押された程度でそんなフラフラしちゃってさ!!
subtitles.english: Getting all wobbly just from being pushed a little!!

subtitles.original: おつおつおつ!!
subtitles.english: RIP RIP RIP!!

subtitles.original: ザコｗ ウゼェェ!!
subtitles.english: Noob lol. SO ANNOYING!!

subtitles.original: いえぇ〜い!! どうよ??
subtitles.english: Yee-haw!! How's that??

subtitles.original: 現状は船長が1位
subtitles.english: Currently Captain is 1st.

subtitles.original: なにブーブーしてんのよ!
subtitles.english: What are you booing about!

subtitles.original: 次がね、上体そらしって言って。うつ伏せの状態で寝転んで
subtitles.english: Next is the upper body back extension. Lie down on your stomach.

subtitles.original: ルール：うつ伏せの状態で背中を後ろに反ってあごが何センチ上がるかを競う
subtitles.english: Rule: From there, arch your back and see how many centimeters your chin rises from the ground.

subtitles.original: どちらかと言うと体の柔らかさと腹筋とか背筋の感じなのかな
subtitles.english: It's probably about flexibility and core/back muscle strength.

subtitles.original: 柔らかいわよ〜マリン。上半身柔らかいよ
subtitles.english: I'm flexible~ Marine. My upper body is flexible.

subtitles.original: 乗りたい乗りたい。乗るのみこちに。え、船長に？
subtitles.english: I want to ride. I'll ride on Mikochi... wait, on Captain?

subtitles.original: こっちはそんな上がらないのあり
subtitles.english: Is it okay if I don't go up that high?

subtitles.original: 痛たた! お尻叩かないで!!
subtitles.english: Ouch! Don't hit my butt!!

subtitles.original: さあと言うわけで、船長の上体そらし... スタート!
subtitles.english: Well then, Captain's upper body back extension... start!
